creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque with three tiered plaque; plaques connected by a single loop of chain; largest plaque has an eagle like bird at center with a dragon on either side; second plaque: fish at center and bird on either side; smallest plaque: insect at center and dragon on either side; background of dots and flora on each plaque; neck piece: strip of metal with two dragons and fish at each end
title: Torque
